pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyā antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā gāmakaṃ ñātikulaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.3: Bhaddā kāpilānī taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apassantī bhikkhuniyo pucchi—“kahaṃ itthannāmā, na dissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.5: “Ammā, amukasmiṃ gāmake etissā ñātikulaṃ. Tattha gantvā vicinathā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.6: Bhikkhuniyo tattha gantvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ passitvā etadavocuṃ—“kissa tvaṃ, ayye, ekikā āgatā, kaccisi appadhaṃsitā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.8: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.10: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.13: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.15: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.16: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:1.17: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo sāketā sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.3: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo nāvike upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—“sādhu no, āvuso, tārethā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.13: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.14: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.16: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.18: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā nadīpāraṃ gacchatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.21: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā nadīpāraṃ gacchissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.23: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.24: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā nadīpāraṃ gaccheyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:2.25: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchantā sāyaṃ aññataraṃ gāmaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.2: Tattha aññatarā bhikkhunī abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā. Aññataro puriso tassā bhikkhuniyā saha dassanena paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.3: Atha kho so puriso tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ seyyaṃ paññapento tassā bhikkhuniyā seyyaṃ ekamantaṃ paññāpesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.4: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī sallakkhetvā—“pariyuṭṭhito ayaṃ puriso; sace rattiṃ āgacchissati, vissaro me bhavissatī”ti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.5: bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā aññataraṃ kulaṃ gantvā seyyaṃ kappesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.6: Atha kho so puriso rattiṃ āgantvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ gavesanto bhikkhuniyo ghaṭṭesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.7: Bhikkhuniyo taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apassantiyo evamāhaṃsu—“nissaṃsayaṃ kho sā bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṃ nikkhantā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.8: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassā rattiyā accayena yena tā bhikkhuniyo tenupasaṅkami. Bhikkhuniyo taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavocuṃ—“kissa tvaṃ, ayye, purisena saddhiṃ nikkhantā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.11: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.13: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā rattiṃ vippavasatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.16: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā rattiṃ vippavasissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.19: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā nadīpāraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā rattiṃ vippavaseyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:3.20: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.2: Tattha aññatarā bhikkhunī vaccena pīḷitā ekikā ohīyitvā pacchā agamāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.4: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī yena tā bhikkhuniyo tenupasaṅkami. Bhikkhuniyo taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavocuṃ—“kissa tvaṃ, ayye, ekikā ohīnā, kaccisi appadhaṃsitā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.7: kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī ekā gaṇamhā ohīyissatīti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gaṇamhā ohīyatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gaṇamhā ohīyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:4.14: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā nadīpāraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā rattiṃ vippavaseyya, ekā vā gaṇamhā ohīyeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.1.6: parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti thullaccayassa,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.1.8: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.1.11: nadī nāma timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā yattha katthaci uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā antaravāsako temiyati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.1.15: saha aruṇuggamanā dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthapāsaṃ vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.1.18: agāmake araññe dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.2.2: dutiyikā bhikkhunī pakkantā vā hoti vibbhantā vā kālaṅkatā vā pakkhasaṅkantā vā,
